price: (55) Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
